Text: FW Hetzel v Enron Cc Linda has informed plaintiffs counsel that the next round of depositions will more than likely have to take place in December because her November calendar is full I understand the process of scheduling deposition preparation meetings and depositions of K Rice and K Hannon are to be scheduled by you or your staff Please let me know their availability for approximately day prep and full day of deposition in December Thank you Lisa Original Message From Linda Broocks mailto Sent Monday October PM To Robichaux Lisa Vote Robert Cash Michelle Subject FW Hetzel v Enron FYII will renotice Hartmans deposition Please let me know about the other depo dates Thanks Linda Original Message From Pat Menefee mailto Sent Monday October PM To Subject Hetzel v Enron Linda October is open and OK on our calendar for the deposition of Mike Hartman See you on Wednesday Pat PS Do you have any available dates yet for the depositions of Ken Rice Kevin Hannon Marnie Cosse and Chad Beers This communication may be protected by the attorneyclient privilege and may contain confidential information intended only for the person to whom it is addressed Any views or opinions expressed are solely those of the author and do not necessarily represent those of Chamberlain Hrdlicka White Williams and Martin Any use dissemination forwarding printing or copying of this email without consent of the originator is strictly prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify Pat Menefee by telephone at

Hetzel v EBS Cc Mike Golden is flexible after November until the end of the year for his deposition I believe he was on the original second list requested by Hetzel however we have discussed noticing him ourselves Marni Cosse is flexible after November until the end of the year for her deposition She was originally included in the second list requested by Hetzel however Glover indicated to you he no longer wants to take her deposition but we may notice it This will be at our costs and Marnie is willing to come based on the representation that she can expense the flight as she is still employed until November and I will take care of the hotel Chad Beers is in the process of transferring to Houston and can be available any time Michelle is checking with Ken Rice and Kevin Hannon to round up the second list of requested deponents Lisa Robichaux Sr Legal Assistant Enron Litigation Unit Smith Street Suite Houston Texas fax Lisa
